metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0193 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
WebSocket08FrameDecoder in Netty 3.6.x before 3.6.9, 3.7.x before 3.7.1,3.8.x before 3.8.2, 3.9.x before 3.9.1, and 4.0.x before 4.0.19 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via aTextWebSocketFrame followed by a long stream ofContinuationWebSocketFrames.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0193` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnetty-java - 1:4.1.7-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netty package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.1.7-4').
